intro: Hoya celebica, commonly known as the Celebes Wax Plant, is a species of flowering plant native to Indonesia. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae and is characterized by its thick, fleshy stems and waxy, ovate leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, star-shaped flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Hoya celebica is a climbing or trailing plant that thrives in bright, indirect light and well-draining soil. It is popular among houseplant enthusiasts for its attractive foliage and ease of care.
